name: Drunky man: The 10 Bottles (Demo)
description:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

A project developed by i_am_wizard, inspired by the showcase TV Show: Trailer Park Boys & Slender man franchise.

____________________________

it really isn't easy stealing and drinking Mr. Lahey's booze all day long! with him and that cheeseburger-eating walrus chasing us around! i really think Lahey has had WAY too many to drink boys.

trevor, 2 smokes lets go.

____________________________

OBJECTIVE: Collect all 10 liquor bottles before HE gets you.

____________________________

CONTROLS:

WASD - move

Mouse - look

Shift - Sprint

F - Flashlight

P - Pause

(Walking into a liquor bottle automatically collects it!)

____________________________

WHAT IN THE FUCK?:

This is my first game that is planned to release, and better yet; this Halloween! I am so thrilled to see what others think of it seeing i spent the last 2 months doing nothing else but developing this game. 

The idea for this game came to bout when my brother, out of the blue, said to me "Slender man the eight pages, but it's Jim Lahey" and... well, i kinda just went from there!

____________________________

REPORT BUGS AND ISSUES:

If you happen to find a glitch, or something that seems too buggy to just be a part of the PSX experience, then let me know in a comment! i know for a fact this game is still a bit away from being fully fledged, and i would like to further test it in order to get it to play and feel the best it can!

(For game-breaking bugs, please include a video including the entire glitched section of the game. Thanks!)

otherwise, enjoy :)

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

More content coming soon!

🎃 Demo v.0.1.0 is now released! Happy spooktober 🎃
